summary: A cheat sword to use in really hard boss fight or just for fun
descriptionHtml:
You can make this at a forge with the perk "silver tongue" because, why not?  You need 5 ale to make it and 10 ale to improve it although you don't need to.  
  I recommend you just use console commands to get this. 
Open the console type "help Cheat" or "che" and then find the ID and put
player.additem (item id) 1
  This is one of my first working mods so please go easy on me with feedback and if there are any problems please tell me.
This was made using the creation kit.
If you try to swing the sword and do not see it moving, do not panic, it is just because I set the speed up so high that you can't see it actually swing.  (Usually)
DO NOT SIDEWAYS POWER ATTACK AS IT WILL GLITCH FOR A FEW SECONDS!!!!!
Only has a weight of 1.
I recommend downloading manually and putting in your Skyrim data and extracting it there.  Try it with either MO or NMM first though.  MO recommended.
May require SKSE
author: Corduero
